Package net.tnemc.core.transaction

Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
net.tnemc.core.transaction.Transaction
public class Transaction extends Object
Represents a financial transaction.
Since:
0.1.2.0
Author:
creatorfromhell

  • Method Details

    • isToLosing

      public boolean isToLosing()
      Used to determine if the "to" participant is losing funds in this transaction.
      Returns:
      True if the "to" participant is losing funds, otherwise false.

    • isFromLosing

      public boolean isFromLosing()
      Used to determine if the "from" participant is losing funds in this transaction.
      Returns:
      True if the "from" participant is losing funds, otherwise false.

    • of

      public static Transaction of(String type)
      Used to create a new Transaction object from the specified transaction type.
      Parameters:
      type - The identifier of the transaction type.
      Returns:
      An instance of the Transaction object created with the specified type.

    • from

      public Transaction from(UUID id, HoldingsModifier modifier)
      Used to set the from participant.
      Parameters:
      id - The identifier of this participant.
      modifier - The modifier associated with this participant.
      Returns:
      An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.

    • from

      public Transaction from(Account account, HoldingsModifier modifier)
      Used to set the from participant.
      Parameters:
      account - The account reference of this participant.
      modifier - The modifier associated with this participant.
      Returns:
      An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.

    • source

      public Transaction source(ActionSource source)

    • admin

      public Transaction admin(boolean admin)
      Used to set this as an administrator performed transaction. This allows it to override certain things such as account statuses.
      Parameters:
      admin - If this transaction is an administrator transaction or not.
      Returns:
      An instance of the Transaction object with the new source.

    • processor

      public Transaction processor(TransactionProcessor processor)
      Used to set processor of this transaction.
      Parameters:
      processor - The processor of this transaction.
      Returns:
      An instance of the Transaction object with the new processor.

    • process

      public void process(Consumer<TransactionResult> resultConsumer) throws InvalidTransactionException
      Processes the transaction and sends the result to the Result Handler.
      Throws:
      InvalidTransactionException - If all required aspects of the transaction are not present.

    • process

      public TransactionResult process() throws InvalidTransactionException
      Processes the transaction and sends the result to the Result Handler.
      Throws:
      InvalidTransactionException - If all required aspects of the transaction are not present.
